title.rendered: Board of Education Meeting on July 28

content.rendered:
The Board of Education will hold a meeting on July 28.  The meeting will be held in the MacFadden Administration Building.  Watch the meeting through youtube.

  • 5:30 p.m: Board Workshop to discuss safety and security with District Emergency Response Team members 
  • 6:30 p.m.: Public Hearing: District-wide Safety Plan
  • 7 p.m.: Regular BOE Meeting

Meeting agendas and minutes are posted through BoardDocs.
